main event: A report of a UFO sighting involving a metallic or metallic-looking object observed in Bedford, Ohio on June 8, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering at an altitude of 500 to 600 feet,The observation lasted about 5 to 7 minutes,sightings in a clear sky with no sound or visible exhaust were reported,The object was described as emitting a brilliant light,The witness expressed concern for confidentiality regarding their identity.
sighted object: a shiny white light or metallic object
witness description: A civilian who preferred to remain anonymous.
